subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Dillon Gee encountered one of the worst starts of his career, creating an insurmountable deficit for the Mets, who lost to the Phillies and fell to 5-3 on the season.
snippet: Pitcher Dillon Gee encountered one of the worst starts of his career, creating an insurmountable deficit for the Mets, who lost to the Phillies and fell to 5-3 on the season.
